snippet: At least four people were killed in what appeared to be a knife fight, officials said, in a region where ethnic Uighur bridle at what they call discrimination by the Han Chinese.
lead_paragraph: At least four people were killed in what appeared to be a knife fight, officials said, in a region where ethnic Uighur bridle at what they call discrimination by the Han Chinese.

headline.seo: Killings Stir Fears of Ethnic Tensions in Chinese Region
headline.main: Killings Stir Fears of Ethnic Tensions in Chinese Region
headline.print_headline: Killings Stir Fears of Ethnic Tensions in Chinese Region
